definition: "heavenly lake", lake situated on a mountain/used as the name of numerous lakes, such as 長白山天池|长白山天池[Chang2 bai2 shan1 Tian1 chi2]
Changbaishan Tianchi, volcanic crater lake on the border between China and North Korea

sentences.english: The Tian Chi lake's water was warm, and the water is blue and deep.
sentences.chinese: 天池湖的水是蓝色的，非常深，而且很温暖。

sentences.english: Yan Tianchi was one of the founders of Yushan Guqin School in Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 严天池是明代虞山琴派的创始者之一。

sentences.english: There have been reports of monsters in Lake Tianchi.
Lake Tianchi is the highest volcanic lake in the world.
sentences.chinese: 天池是世界上最高的火山湖。

sentences.english: Tianchikou landslide is a large unconsolidated deposit landslide in Geheyan reservoir area on Qing River.
sentences.chinese: 天池口滑坡是清江隔河岩库区一大型松散堆积物滑坡。

sentences.english: At the lake shore, there was a small gravelly beach.
sentences.chinese: 在天池岸边，有一块不大的砾石滩。

definition: Changbaishan Tianchi, volcanic crater lake on the border between China and North Korea
the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
Tianshan mountain range between XinJiang and Mongolia and Kyrgyzstan
name of a peak by the Three Gorges 長江三峽|长江三峡[Chang2 Jiang1 San1 xia2]
Changbai or Baekdu mountains 白頭山|白头山, volcanic mountain range between Jilin province and North Korea, prominent in Manchu and Korean mythology
